biotools.summary: Integrated database for plant RNA modifications. It contains 20 plant species and provides an intuitive interface to display the information. PRMD provides visualization and functional analysis tools, such as RMlevelDiff, RMplantVar, RNAmodNet and Blast to perform different analyses, and mRNAbrowse, RNAlollipop, JBrowse and Integrative Genomics Viewer (IGV) to visually display the analysis and statistical results.

bioschemas.name: PRMD
